keywords: ['dance song', 'african beat', 'male voice', 'male backing voices', 'percussion', 'groovy bassline', 'flute', 'moderate tempo', 'happy mood', 'repetitive melody']
caption: This African beat song features a male voice singing the main melody. Other voices sing one word after each line. This is accompanied by percussion playing an African dance beat. The bass plays a groovy bassline. A flute plays the same melody as the main voice. This song has a happy mood. This song can be played in a dance party.
